name: XWUI JSON Input Component
description: JSON input component with validation and formatting. Extends XWUITextarea with JSON-specific features including syntax validation, auto-formatting, and error display. Useful for configuration editors and JSON data entry.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

formatOnBlur.description: Whether to format JSON on blur

validateOnBlur.description: Whether to validate JSON on blur

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the JSON input

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

value.description: JSON value as string or parsed object
